comment.author: 80456351@N00
comment._content: I couldn't stop looking at how perfectly tailored they are. I think a civil engineer was consulted. And then, the hat...I can't figure it out. It looks like the original hat is underneath, being kept warm by a hat warmer doily.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/la_belle_province] Well, after all, hat warmer doilies were all the rage in 1904!  :)
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 21500285@N05
comment._content: I am planning on doing a Victorian / Edwardian period set of photoshoots, and this is exactly the type of reference material that I have been looking for. I love the perfectly tailored outfits, the wonderfully groomed and mannered subjects, the palm trees, the backgrounds, and the period furniture that always seems to be present in these era portraits

comment._content: Nice Photo & Background. Nice Expressions. A Lovely & Beautiful Young Couple.

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/21500285@N05] Delighted to be of assistance! Please do let us see your work if any of our photos particularly inspire you - it's always great to see our "old" photos taking on new life...  :)
